page.title: 10INTERNATIONAL EVENING
page.content: Amita writes:{'An International {Evening'}at my school is when all the parents come together and have a good time.They sit together at small tables and talk, watch the entertainment and eat. Parents wear their own{national} {costumes}from many countries. My mother wore her saree. There are foods of all kinds, sweet, savoury, hot and juicy and people have brought their own dishes of food which is usually a recipe from their own country. No children can go unless they are part of the entertainment. This year I was part of that when I sang in the choir. We had to learn six songs in one day because some children could not come after all. We enjoyed the evenig though and were glad to be picked. Greek and Indian dancers were also performing and we could watch them. Parents look forward to this event.
